LocaleResource.Name: Products.MinimumQuantityNotification
LocaleResource.Value: This product has a minimum quantity of {0}

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.Configuration.Settings.Catalog.DisplayTaxShippingInfoShoppingCart.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Check to display tax and shipping info on the shopping cart page. This option is used in Germany.

LocaleResource.Name: ShoppingCart.TaxShipping.ExclTax
LocaleResource.Value: All prices are entered excluding tax. Excluding shipping

LocaleResource.Name: ShoppingCart.TaxShipping.InclTax
LocaleResource.Value: All prices are entered including tax. Excluding shipping

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.Configuration.Stores.Fields.DefaultLanguage.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: This property allows a store owner to specify a default language for a store. If not specified, then the default language display order will be used.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.Catalog.Products.Fields.OverriddenGiftCardAmount.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Enter gift card amount that can be used after purchase. If not specified, then product price will be used.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.Configuration.Settings.CustomerUser.DateOfBirthMinimumAge.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Enter minimum allowed age. Leave empty if customers of all ages are allowed.

LocaleResource.Name: Plugins.Shipping.AustraliaPost.Fields.HideDeliveryInformation.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Check to hide delivery information as description of returned shipping methods.

LocaleResource.Name: ShoppingCart.Rental.StartDateShouldBeFuture
LocaleResource.Value: Rental start date should be the future date

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.Configuration.Settings.Media.VendorThumbPictureSize.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: The default size (pixels) for vendor thumbnail images.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.Configuration.Settings.Vendor.AllowCustomersToApplyForVendorAccount
LocaleResource.Value: Allow customers to apply for vendor account

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.Configuration.Settings.Vendor.AllowCustomersToApplyForVendorAccount.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Check to allow customers users to fill a form to become a new vendor. Then a store owner will have to manually approve it.

LocaleResource.Name: Vendors.ApplyAccount.Submitted
LocaleResource.Value: Your request has been submitted successfully. We''ll contact you soon.

LocaleResource.Name: Vendors.ApplyAccount.AlreadyApplied
LocaleResource.Value: You already applied for a vendor account. Please register as a new customer in order to apply for one more vendor account.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.Configuration.Settings.RewardPoints.PointsAccumulatedForAllStores.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Check to accumulate all reward points in one balance for all stores so they can be used in any store. Otherwise, each store has its own rewards points and they can only be used in that store. WARNING: not recommended to change in production environment with several stores already created.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.Customers.Customers.RewardPoints.Fields.AddRewardPointsStore.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Choose a store. It''s useful only when you have "Points accumulated for all stores" setting disabled.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.Configuration.Settings.Catalog.AllowViewUnpublishedProductPage
LocaleResource.Value: Allow viewing of unpublished product details page

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.Configuration.Settings.Catalog.AllowViewUnpublishedProductPage.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Check to allow viewing of unpublished product details page. This way SEO won''t be affected by search crawlers when a product is temporary unpublished. Please note that a store owner always has access to unpublished products.

LocaleResource.Name: ShoppingCart.Discount.CannotBeUsedAnymore
LocaleResource.Value: Sorry, you''ve used this discount already

LocaleResource.Name: ShoppingCart.Discount.CannotBeUsedWithGiftCards
LocaleResource.Value: Sorry, this discount cannot be used with gift cards in the cart

LocaleResource.Name: ShoppingCart.Discount.NotStartedYet
LocaleResource.Value: Sorry, this offer is not started yet

LocaleResource.Name: Plugins.DiscountRules.HadSpentAmount.NotEnough
LocaleResource.Value: Sorry, this offer requires more money spent (previously placed orders)

LocaleResource.Name: Wishlist.AddToCart.Error
LocaleResource.Value: Some product(s) from wishlist could not be moved to the cart for some reasons.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.ContentManagement.Topics.Fields.SubjectToAcl.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Determines whether the topic is subject to ACL (access control list).

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.ContentManagement.Topics.Fields.AclCustomerRoles.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Select customer roles for which the topic will be shown.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.Configuration.Settings.GeneralCommon.EnableCssBundling.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Enable to combine (bundle) multiple CSS files into a single file. Do not enable if you''re running grandnode in IIS virtual directory. Note that this functionality requires significant server resources (not recommended to use with cheap shared hosting plans).

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.Configuration.Settings.GeneralCommon.EnableJsBundling.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Enable to combine (bundle) multiple JavaScript files into a single file. Note that this functionality requires significant server resources (not recommended to use with cheap shared hosting plans).

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.Catalog.Products.ProductAttributes.Attributes.Condition.Description
LocaleResource.Value: Conditional attributes appear if a previous attribute is selected, such as having an option for personalizing clothing with a name and only providing the text input box if the "Personalize" radio button is checked

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.Catalog.Products.ProductAttributes.Attributes.Condition.EnableCondition.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Check to specify a condition (depending on other attribute) when this attribute should be enabled (visible).

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.Configuration.Settings.Order.MinOrderSubtotalAmountIncludingTax
LocaleResource.Value: Calculate ''Min order sub-total amount'' including tax

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.Configuration.Settings.Order.MinOrderSubtotalAmountIncludingTax.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Check to calculate ''Min order sub-total amount'' value including tax; otherwise excluding tax.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.Catalog.Products.Fields.MarkAsNew.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Check to mark this product as New

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.Catalog.Products.Fields.MarkAsNewStartDateTimeUtc.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Set Product as New from Date in Coordinated Universal Time (UTC).

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.Catalog.Products.Fields.MarkAsNewEndDateTimeUtc.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Set Product as New to Date in Coordinated Universal Time (UTC).

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.Configuration.Settings.Catalog.NewProductsEnabled.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Check to enable the ''New products'' page in your store

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.Configuration.Settings.Catalog.NewProductsNumber
LocaleResource.Value: Number of products on ''New products'' page

LocaleResource.Value: The number of products to display when ''New products'' page is enabled.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.Promotions.Discounts.Fields.AppliedToSubCategories.Hint
